TopicTitle: Does anyone know how mods like BD Armory get their own custom tabs in the Vab?

Articles.Content: I downloaded some new mods that add a lot of parts to the game, so I'm hoping to be able to program in some custom tabs and reassign those parts to them. If anyone familiar with ksp modding knows how to do this, it would be awesome to get some help. Thank you
look at the addon "Community Category Kit (CCK)" the source code should be on GitHub
